sitename: Antler Farms - 100% Pure 8X Mushroom Complex Equiv. to 12 600mg - Organic Five Mushroom Blend of Concentrated 8:1 Extracts
cleaned_text: Complex is a powerful blend of five of the most beneficial mushroom extracts in the world - Lion's Mane, Reishi, Cordyceps, Chaga, and Turkey Tail. ORGANIC 8:1 LION'S MANE EXTRACT Lion's Mane is a powerful anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and immunostimulant. But the most notable benefit of Lion's Mane is its ability to enhance cognitive function. It is a superfood for your brain - boosting mental capacity, memory and mood. ORGANIC 8:1 REISHI EXTRACT Known as the "King of Mushrooms", Reishi's royal reputation stems from its history of use in holistic medicine. It is considered an adaptogenic herb which helps the body deal with the negative effects of stress. This superfood contains phytochemicals that activate immune cells to boost the body's entire immune system. ORGANIC 10:1 CORDYCEPS EXTRACT Cordyceps is known for balancing and strengthening the body's internal systems. Several studies suggest that cordyceps can boost athletic performance - improving physical abilities, endurance, and recovery. ORGANIC 8:1 CHAGA EXTRACT Chaga is one of the most powerful antioxidants in the world. It has been used for centuries in the East as a medicinal mushroom. As an adaptogen, it helps protect the body's cells from damage caused by free radicals. ORGANIC 8:1 TURKEY TAIL EXTRACT Turkey tail mushroom has an assortment of therapeutic properties. It been used to treat various maladies for hundreds of years in Asia, Europe, and by indigenous peoples in North America. However, it is best known for its ability to enhance the immune system.
